issue.title: Clean up rules for op.gg
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] I checked the documentation and found no answer;
- [x] I checked to make sure that this issue has not already been filed;
- [x] This is not an ad/bug report.

### Problem description

OP.GG changed their domain handling a while ago. Specifically, they unified all domains to op.gg by removing subdomains, even for tracker sites for titles other than League of Legends, such as tft.op.gg. As a result, the rules with subdomains included in the filter are not working.

www.op.gg
tft.op.gg
na.op.gg
valorant.op.gg
overwatch.op.gg


### Proposed solution

I think the rules with subdomains should be fixed. Also, I think it's necessary to remove any rules that are now outdated.

### Additional information

_No response_
